//: Appears in the refugee center as a guard with custom dialogue.

responses.text: Anything I can do for you?

dynamic_line: This is a refugee center that we've made into a sort of trading hub.

responses.text: So are you with the government or something?

dynamic_line: Ha ha ha, no.  Though there is Old Guard somewhere around here if you have any questions relating to what the government is up to.

responses.text: Oh, okay.  I'll go look for him

dynamic_line: Anything valuable really.  If you really want to know, go ask one of the actual traders.  I'm just protection.

responses.text: I'll go talk to them later.
So no negotiating?  No, 'If-you-do-me-a-favor-then-we'll-let-you-in type deal?'
That's a pretty messed up analogy.

dynamic_line: Then leave.  You have two feet, right?  Use them.

responses.text: No need to be a dick.
*whispers a snide remark a little too loudly*
I'll have three if you don't stop being a little bitch.
You want to get skullfucked?  Keep fuckin' talking!
You'll look good in my freezer.

dynamic_line: Depends on what you want.  Go talk to a merchant if you have anything to sell.  Otherwise the Old Guard liaison might have something, if you can find him.  But if you're just looking for someone to put a good word in, I might have something for you.

responses.text: A good word might be helpful.  What do you need?
Old Guard huh, I'll go talk to him!

dynamic_line: That's just our nickname for them.  They're what's left of the federal government.  Don't know how legitimate they are but they are named after some military unit that once protected the president.  Their liaison is usually hanging around here somewhere.

responses.text: Okay, I'll go look for him then.

dynamic_line: Stay safe out there.  Hate to have to kill you after you've already died.

description: Make a friend at the refugee center by handing over around five packs - 100 cigarettes.

dialogue.describe: Come on man, I just need a smoke.
dialogue.offer: With all that's been going on, it's been more and more difficult to find a smoke.  My stash has been running low for a while now.  Think you could help me out here?  A few packs is all I need.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, it's great to see someone willing to help a guy out.
dialogue.rejected: Well, I'll find someone else to do it for me.
dialogue.advice: Plenty of smokers in towns.  Gotta be some left over cigs in some of them houses.
dialogue.success: Thanks!  I'll be sure to put in a good word for you around the center.
